summary:
### Summary of GitHub Activity for scaffold-eth/se-2-challenges in June 2025

- **Major Features and Improvements:**
  - Merged multiple pull requests related to the migration of challenges to be compatible with the beta branch, including updates for decentralized staking, multisig, and prediction markets.
  - Added a new stablecoin challenge and made updates to existing challenges to enhance user experience and learning.

- **Bug Fixes:**
  - Fixed font issues by adjusting the configuration for Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
  - Addressed build issues for the over-collateralized lending challenge and updated images for clarity and differentiation.

- **Overall Themes:**
  - A significant focus on updating and migrating challenges to align with the latest beta version.
  - Continuous improvements to documentation and user interface elements, including README updates and image visibility adjustments.

topIssues.title: Not human-readable errors when contract-to-contract transaction fails
Redundant quotes in the md files
Migrate challenges to args compatible with beta branch
Update Nodejs version in all challenges

topPRs.title: Changes of OCL challenge which was reverted
